name: inline-parameters-extended
description: Function parameter annotations displaying inline in VSCode

inline-parameters.go.hintBeforeParameter.markdownDescription: Should the inlay hint appear before the parameter. If this is set to `false` the hint will appear after the parameter.

inline-parameters.go.showVariadicNumbers.markdownDescription: Show the number of times a variadic parameter has been called.

inline-parameters.go.suppressWhenArgumen.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

inline-parameters.java.hintBeforeParamet.markdownDescription: Should the inlay hint appear before the parameter. If this is set to `false` the hint will appear after the parameter.

inline-parameters.java.showVariadicNumbe.markdownDescription: Show the number of times a variadic parameter has been called.

inline-parameters.java.suppressWhenArgum.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

inline-parameters.lua.hintBeforeParamete.markdownDescription: Should the inlay hint appear before the parameter. If this is set to `false` the hint will appear after the parameter.

inline-parameters.lua.suppressWhenArgume.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

inline-parameters.php.hintBeforeParamete.markdownDescription: Should the inlay hint appear before the parameter. If this is set to `false` the hint will appear after the parameter.

inline-parameters.php.showDollarSign.markdownDescription: Show the $ character before PHP parameter names.

inline-parameters.php.showVariadicNumber.markdownDescription: Show the number of times a variadic parameter has been called.

inline-parameters.php.suppressWhenArgume.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

inline-parameters.python.executablePath.markdownDescription: Path to python executable. Setting this overrides the default of using the same path as `ms-python` or the default shell path if `ms-python` is not installed.

inline-parameters.python.hintBeforeParam.markdownDescription: Should the inlay hint appear before the parameter. If this is set to `false` the hint will appear after the parameter.

inline-parameters.python.showVariadicNum.markdownDescription: Show the number of times a variadic parameter has been called.

inline-parameters.python.suppressWhenArg.markdownDescription: Suppress parameter name hints on arguments whose text is identical to the parameter name.

scripts.copyfiles: npm run copy-go && npm run copy-python
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run -S esbuild-base -- --minify && npm run copyfiles
